snippet: In an Argentine road movie by Javier Rebollo, a former hit man and a new companion are going nowhere slowly.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews Javier Rebollo film The Dead Man and Being Happy, starring Jose Sacristan and Roxana Blanco.
lead_paragraph: In an Argentine road movie by Javier Rebollo, a former hit man and a new companion are going nowhere slowly.

headline.print_headline: Life Is Long, but Then So Are the Country Roads of Argentina
headline.seo: ‘The Dead Man and Being Happy,’ by Javier Rebollo
